title: Beau apologises over ‘affair’ scandal
text:
New Macbeth almost matches Polanski’s 10:47 AM Leigh Paatsch REVIEW: Justin Kurzel’s Macbeth cements the Snowtown director as one of Australia’s finest directors on the world stage. Damon dazzles as stranded astronaut 10:44 AM Leigh Paatsch National film critic REVIEW: THE Martian is one of the year’s biggest crowd-pleasers, but whatever you do, don’t miss the beginning. Hathaway’s latest turns out wafer-thin 10:34 AM Leigh Paatsch National film critic REVIEW: The Intern, starring Anne Hathaway and Robert De Niro, will make some people a little bit happy, and other people just a tiny bit nauseous. Beau apologises over ‘affair’ scandal 9:53 AM Robbie Patterson FORMER footballer Beau Ryan used his ­appearance on The Footy Show to publicly apologise for the controversy over allegations he had an affair. Blake Lively shuts down lifestyle website 8:24 AM STAFF WRITERS BLAKE Lively is shutting down her lifestyle website Preserve after just one year, admitting it “wasn’t making a difference in people’s lives”. ‘It was the least I could do’ 8:22 AM Alison Stephenson WHILE most women wouldn’t dream of shaving their head, Toni Collette has done it five times, but none has meant more to her than her latest bald appearance. Telstra on ‘go slow’ for Apple users 8:17 AM Rod Chester National technology writer TELSTRA customers with Apple devices have taken to social media after a network glitch turned the last few days into a dismal internet crawl. Beau Ryan apologises over scandal about his alleged affair with former Hi-5 star Lauren Brant October 2, 2015 11:24am Ryan apologises over cheating claims 0:54 
Rugby League personality Beau Ryan has apologised over cheating allegations. October 2nd 2015 Beau Ryan, third from left, on The Footy Show Grand Final Spectacular / Picture: Jonathan Robbie Patterson DailyTelegraph Email a friend 
AN emotional Beau Ryan used his ­appearance on The Footy Show to publicly apologise for the controversy that erupted over allegations he had an affair with ex-Hi-5 star ­Lauren Brant. 
Ryan, 30, opened the show by saying he wanted to “apologise to all of the people who have been hurt recently”. 
A supportive live studio audience emphatically cheered him and shouted encouragement. 
Ryan did not mention his wife of three years Kara Orrell, nor did he mention Brant. “It has been really hard for me and my ­family,” he said. 
“It has been really hard for myself and my family,” he said. 
“I want to thank everyone for their support ... thank you to everyone who has been respectful of my privacy, I would love for people to continue to do that.” 
News_Image_File: Lauren Brant’s fiance went public with the affair. News_Image_File: Beau Ryan with wife Kara and their daughter. 
The incident came to light after Brant’s former partner Warren Riley claimed the duo had cheated on their respective partners back in July. 
Ryan finished by saying he had not returned to the show to “talk about my private life, I am here to talk about a grand final.” 
Moments later Ryan was back to his usual comedic self, laughing with players from the North Queensland Cowboys and Brisbane Broncos ahead of Sunday’s NRL grand final. 
The former NRL player and his family have recently returned from a trip to the US in a bid to repair their relationship. 
BEAU AND WIFE SPOTTED TOGETHER IN SYDNEY 
News_Image_File: The incident came to light after Brant’s former partner Warren Riley claimed the duo had cheated on their respective partners back in July / Picture: Jonathan Ng News_Image_File: Contrite ... Beau Ryan on The Footy Show Grand Final Spectacular / Picture: Jonathan Ng 
News_Rich_Media: Erin Molan confirms Beau Ryan will be back on The Footy Show, as she catches up with Sydney Confidential Live on the Dally M awards red carpet.
